name: Kosmic Kiwi
description:
Play as a Kiwi crash landed on an alien planet full of wacky and colorful plants and rocks to collect! But where did your crew mates go? 

Explore isometric terrain to find resources, craft ship parts, upgrade your equipment, and fix your crashed ship to go save your friends! 

Find your friends on neighboring planets, find new crafting materials and recipes, use your friends’ unique abilities to overcome new obstacles and unlock new paths, and finally head home together!
